english: You're in charge of our office.
And the seal of the Lord
You take care of Oban's honor.

text: Yolumuz çok uzun Yengemi böyle yalnız koyma istersen
english: We've got a long way to go If you want to leave my sister-in-law alone like this

text: Oğuzlar, Moğollarla ölüm kalım savaşına girmişken…
english: When the Oğuz fought the Mongols for life and death...

text: …babamın da dediği gibi bir olmalıyız, birlik olmalıyız
english: As my father used to say, we have to stick together.

text: Onun yanında olduğumu göstermek için elbette ben de geleceğim
english: Of course I'll come along to show him that I'm with him.
Master Titus Solomon and his sons...

text: …Fırat Nehri kıyısındaki bir kervansarayda Oğuz beyleriyle görüşecekler
english: ...to meet the Oğuz gentlemen in a caravan by the River Storm.
What are these Turks trying to do?

text: Moğollara karşı bir ittifak arayışında oldukları söylenmekte efendim
english: They say they're looking for an alliance against the Mongols, sir.
Mankind's Islam is torn to pieces

text: Yakacağımız diriliş ateşi tüm cihana yayılacak ve…
english: The resurrection fire that we're going to burn will spread throughout the world, and...
Lord, you were right. Titus is here.

text: Şövalyeleriyle birlikte kervansarayın yakınına kadar gelmişler
english: He and his knights came near the caravansaray.
He'll stop and listen to the beauty you've made...

text: …onları görüp, içine sindirecek bir yürek verdiğin için sana şükürler olsun
english: ...thank you for giving them a heart to see and digest.
He's been on your path for a long time.

text: …aslanlar gibi evlatlar yetiştirdiğim için sana şükürler olsun
english: ...thank you for raising children like the lions.

text: Evlatlarımın analarıyla şu bülbülün sesi gibi…
english: Like that nightingale with the mothers of my children.

text: …kısa ve güzel bir ömür verdiğin için sana şükürler olsun
english: ...thank you for giving us a short life and a good life.
To the custom of our father, Oğuz.
...the state of this ceremony, Seljuklu, obey.

text: Ve eşhedü enne Muhammeden abdûhü ve resûlü
english: And the Prophet Muhammaden Abduhu and the Prophet
My king has come to fly
That's what my father would have wanted.
...in the name of God the Most High, in the name of ninety-nine.
In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.
...welcome to the elders of my office.

text: Beyimiz Süleyman Şah’ımız ölmeden önce vekâletini bana vermişti
english: Our Lord Solomon gave me his power of attorney before his death.

text: Şimdi Süleyman Şah'sız obamızın geleceğini belirleyeceğiz
english: Now we will determine the future of our Oba without Solomon Shah.
Our last consultation with the Oğuz gentlemen...
...It has been said that Mongols have harassed Anatolia.

text: Küçük Moğol birlikleri, Anadolu topraklarında akınlara başlamıştır
english: Little Mongol troops have begun their raids on Anatolian territory

text: Artık bu zalimler sürüsüne dur demenin vakti gelmiştir
english: It's time to tell these evildoers to stop.

text: O yüzden bütün Oğuz boyları Anadolu’da toplanacaktır
english: So all the Oğuz families will be gathered in Anatolia
...if we don't go through with it...
...if we grow the seeds of hypocrisy between us...

text: …çakal Moğol sürüsünün önünde yem oluruz, yem!
english: ...we'll be bait in front of the Mongol pack, bait!

text: Bu fani dünyada cihana kafa tutalım
Soyumuzdan tek bir kişi kalacağını bilsek bile bu zalimlerle cenk edelim
english: Let's fight these tyrants even if we know there's only one of our descendants left.

text: Geldiğimiz Anadolu topraklarına dönmeye ne dersiniz beylerim?
english: Why don't we go back to the Anatolian land we came from, gentlemen?
It's time for our caravan to be on the road.

text: Vakit, Moğol eşkıyasına dur deme vaktidir
english: It's time to tell the Mongol bandit to stop.

text: Kayılar Anadolu’nun dirilişi için yol aldılar
english: The apricots are on their way to the resurrection of Anatolia.
As they move on, the persecution will end...

text: Gönlünde pişip de diline erişemeyen nedir Halime Sultan?
english: What is in your heart that can't reach your tongue, Halima Sultan?
If I've spoken evil, my tongue will rot.
If I broke your heart without knowing

text: Kem söz gelecekse senin tatlı dilinden gelsin Ertuğrul
english: If the word comes, let it come from your sweet tongue, Ertuğrul.
All this time you've been my man, you've been my man
I haven't heard a word you're saying.
Then why are you like this?

text: Süleyman Şah öleli iki kış üç yaz geçti Ertuğrul
english: It's been two winters and three summers since Solomon Shah died, Ertuğrul
No stops, no stops, no stops.

text: Ne bir yaylakta ne bir kışlakta gün yüzü görmedik
english: We didn't see the light of day on a plateau or in a barracks.
The nomad's fatigue starts when it's flat.

text: Bahar gelip düşülecek yolun tasasını büyütür içinde
english: Spring grows in the way to come and fall

text: Lakin ne gün yüzü arar gözlerim…
english: But I can't see the light of day...
...nor will my heart be troubled by immigration.
It's good enough for me to be by your side

text: Yeni kışlığa birkaç gün yolumuz kaldı
english: We're a few days away from the new winter.

text: Dayımın obası da yakın Birkaç gün uzakta, güvenli bir yer
english: My uncle's office is close too. It's a safe place a few days away.

text: Bu kışı da geçirdik mi gerisi kolay
english: Once we get through this winter, the rest is easy.

text: Artık endişe edecek bir şey kalmayacak
english: There's nothing to worry about anymore.
Let's hope we get the home we deserve.
My concern isn't for me, Ertugrul.

text: Bir vakit Süleyman Şah’ıma bir söz verdiydik
english: At one time, we made a promise to my king, Solomon.
We were going to name them Gündüz Prosecutor and Osman.
Good boys and girls will cheer us up.

text: O vakit kimin için endişelenirsin ceylan gözlüm?
english: Then who are you worried about, my gazelle eyes?
We're going to have a child.

text: Eğer rüyam doğruysa sana bir oğul vereceğim
english: If my dream is true I'll give you a son

text: Üstte mavi gök altta yağız yer…
english: The blue sky above is the wet ground at the bottom...
I'm going to be a father, Dad!

text: Dur. Sakin ol Daha çok erken
english: Wait, calm down, it's too soon.
How can I be calm, my gazelle eyes?

text: Bütün otağımız bu haber için yanar tutuşurdu
english: Our whole tent would burn for this news.

text: Keşke Süleyman Şah’ımız da bu duruma şahit olaydı
english: If only our King Solomon had witnessed this situation.
What we're going to get to is the barracks...
and how many times we shall reach.

text: …nerede benim yiğit babam diye ağlatmayasın oğlunu Ertuğrul
english: ...where you can make your son cry as my brave father, Ertuğrul
I don't know what fate he's destined for us.
But as long as I live...

text: …ne sana ne de evladımıza gam da tasa da yaşatmam. Bilesin Halime Sultan
english: I won't let you or our child grieve you, Halima Sultan.
May Allah keep you in mind.
If you want your wife to live, turn yourself in.

text: Bu sana son uyarımdır bilesin bey oğlu!
english: This is your last warning, you son of a bitch!

text: Arkana bakmadan atlara doğru koş Halime
english: Run to the horses without looking back, Halima
Let my brother know that the sun has risen
Hurry up and change the way of the caravan
Let them come to help us, Halima!
Don't let that bitch get away.

text: Sen de, obandan arta kalanlar da kışlağa varamayacaksınız Ertuğrul
english: You and what's left of you won't make it to the barracks, Ertugrul.

text: Sana bir şey olmasına izin vermeyeceğim
english: I won't let anything happen to you.
Your entire caravan has tasted our pusats.

text: Yoksa ölüm bile senin için kurtuluş olmaz
english: Or even death won't be a salvation for you.
Once upon a time, you were the dog of my ancestor, Oğuz.

text: …şimdi Fırat ve Dicle’nin suladığı bütün topraklar…
english: ...now all the land which Firat and Dicle had watered...
...the property of the son of Cengiz Han.

text: Üç, beş çadırınızla, sürülerinizle gidebileceğiniz son yere geldiniz
english: You've come to the last place with three, five tents and your herds.

text: Cengiz Han’ın ordusundan kaçacak yeriniz yok
english: You have no escape from Genghis Khan's army.

text: Bu topraklar yiğidin harman olduğu diyarlardır
english: This land is the land where the man blends.
But we won't give you any land
We'll make you vomit blood in Anatolia, Kan!
Then you will understand the power of Mongolia.
Pack up, you lazy bastards. Let's go.
Aytolun Hatun asked us to carry these.

text: Bu obada benim kelamım tekrarlanmaz Anlamadın mı sen bunu?
english: My words don't repeat in this room. Don't you understand that?

text: Rahmetli eşinin eşyalarını taşımama izin vermene çok sevindim
english: I'm so glad you let me carry your late wife's things.
You should know that my respect for him is infinite.

text: Lakin gayrı bu otağın hanımı benim
english: But I am the mistress of this tent

text: Eğer otağda varlığım kabul olmaz ise
english: If my presence in the tent is not accepted,
How can I control the family, sir?
The woman who gave me life again.

text: Sen otağımın da kalbimin de sultanısın
english: You're the Sultan of my bed and my heart
What a disgrace this Tugtekin is.
...to remove my mother's tracks from this tent, my lord.

text: Sen ne hadle bana akıl vermeye kalkarsın?
english: What the hell are you trying to tell me?
Dad, as long as I'm breathing...
...they can't be taken out of this tent.

text: O zaman sen de şunu iyi bil
Buyruğuma karşı gelen evladım da olsa nefesini keserim
english: I'll take your breath away, even if it's my son who disobeys my command.

text: Madem Tuğtekin evladımız anasının izi bu otağdan silinmesin der…
english: If Tugtekin's son says his mother's mark should not be wiped from this bed...

text: …Tuğtekin evladımız Aytolun anasına da saygıda kusur eylemesin
english: ...and don't make mistakes in respect of our son Aytol's mother.

text: Hayme halanın obasından haber var mıdır?
english: Have you heard from Aunt Hayme's room?
Your brick still doesn't digest me, sir.
His mother will know about me too.

text: Ne olur sen bir de bunun için üzülme

english: The burden of all the people is on your shoulders.

text: Sen her daim böyle yanımda durduktan sonra hatunum
english: After you've always stood by me like this, I'm a girl.
I don't thank anyone, just so you know.
My dear, you've been sacrificed, Mother.

text: Sensiz bu oba, bu yurt bana zindan oldu ana
english: Without you, this house has become a prison for me, Mother.
♪ Once upon a time ♪ ♪ On a meadow ♪ ♪ where you spread joy ♪

text: Mürüvvetimi göremeden ecel seni benden aldı
english: Death took you away from me before I could see my bliss.
I couldn't show you a grandson's face.
But I miss you so much, Mother.
Even if my pusats bring down the enemy
Even if I have the glory, the glory

text: Demek erkeği azgın boğa eyleyen şurup bu ha?
english: So this is the syrup that makes the man horny?

text: Eğer bu yaptığımı duyarsa Artuk Bey beni öldürür hanımım
english: If Mr. Artuk hears about this, he'll kill me, ma'am.

text: Ben oldukça sana hiçbir şey olmaz
english: As long as I stay, nothing will happen to you.

text: Korkut Bey'in senin sayende keyifli geceler geçiriyor
english: Mr. Scare is having fun nights because of you.
You raised Belkis Hatun very well.
He's as good at his job as you are.

text: İnşallah gönlü de eli kadar temiz olur Aytolun Hatun
english: May his heart be as pure as his hand Aytolun Hatun
I wish I knew you were coming.

text: Biraz da Belkıs Ebe'den hatunlara derman olacak bazı tavsiyeler alayım dedim
english: And I thought I'd take some advice from Belkis Mid-Eb to help the ladies.
I hope you found a cure.

text: Söyle hemen şifa çadırında hazırlıklara başlasınlar
english: Tell them to get ready in the healing tent right away.
I smell trouble in the air.

text: Hemen yaralılara gidip yardım edin, hemen
english: Go to the wounded and help them now.

text: Bacım, ne oldu size? Ne bu hal?

english: Save my daughter, be good to her
In the name of Allah, the Most Gracious, the Most Merciful.

text: Abi, Ertuğrul'la Halime kervan düzlükte dinlenirken
english: Brother, Ertuğrul and Halima are resting in the plain
They went into the woods to breathe.
And the sun came up, and he was gathering the caravan.
We don't know what's going on.
I don't know who's dead, I don't know who's alive.

text: Hiç bu kadar kalabalık görmemiştim onları
english: I've never seen them so crowded.
While an arm attacks the Alps
They attacked like a hungry wolf.
Abyssin Oba has fought a lot.
He's never seen such a cruel man.

text: Kadınlarımız, çocuklarımız da silahlarıyla karşı koydular
english: Our women, our children, they fought back with their guns.

text: Erleri, ağabeyleri, oğulları gibi mertçe vuruştular
english: They fought like men, brothers, sons.
But most people didn't survive death.

text: Demek ki Moğollar tahminimizden evvel hareket etti
english: So the Mongols have moved ahead of schedule.
Now the hard times wait for us
Aunt, I heard the news. I'm sorry.
Tugtekin, my black and black nephew.

text: size bu zulmü yapanlara cihanı dar edeceğim hala
english: I'm still going to hurt the people who did this to you.

text: Gündoğdu abin de onların hakkından gelecektir inşallah
english: It's daylight, and your brother's gonna take care of them, I hope.
Of course they will, my aunt, of course.
It's true what they say, Dad.

text: Cengiz Han'ın eniği Ögeday bunu boşuna yollamamış buraya
english: Genghis Khan's puppy Item didn't send this here for nothing.
They've got something to see, son.
Ertugrul and I were watering our horses, Mother.

text: Beni haber etmem için gönderdi Ertuğrul
english: He sent me to inform Ertugrul
I hit the Mongols on the way out.
I managed to kill them and escape.

text: Ertuğrul Bey'im o itlere pabuç bırakmaz
english: Mr. Ertugrul won't let those bastards down.

text: Göç kervanını yakılıp, yıkılmış görünce ne edeceğimi bilemedim
english: I didn't know what to do when I saw the caravan burned down.
I went to the last place I saw my Ertugrul.

text: Ertuğrul nicesinin kokuşmuş leşini yere sermişti
english: Ertugrül knocked down the rotten carcass of many.
I found your horse, not molten.

text: Ne bir yaylakta ne bir kışlakta gün yüzü görmedik
english: We didn't see the light of day on a plateau or in a barracks.

text: Bu kışı da geçirdik mi gerisi kolay
english: Once we get through this winter, the rest is easy.

text: Artık endişe edecek bir şey kalmayacak
english: There's nothing to worry about anymore.
My concern isn't for me, Ertugrul.
What we're going to get to is the barracks.
And how many times We shall reach them,

text: nerede benim yiğit babam diye ağlatmayasın oğlunu Ertuğrul
english: Don't make your son cry because he's my brave father.

text: bana intikamımı almadan ölmeyi nasip etme yarabbim
english: Don't let me die without my revenge.
You are the Forgiver of Ishmael to Abraham the Most High.
You're the one who turned Joseph
My life's Yongam in this world
Don't leave me in this world without her.
God damn you, don't let him live!
Hamza, take good care of this dog.
We need to get him to talk.
We don't know where Ertugrul is, son.

text: Alpleri hazırla. Kardeşimi aramak için yola düşeceğiz
english: Prepare the Alps, we'll be on our way to look for my brother.
There's no news of any of them, son.
Come on, let's get in the tent.

text: Bir akıl yürütelim ona göre hareket ederiz
english: Let's make some sense. We'll act on it.
This Mutt can tell us where they are.

text: Siz hele otağda dinlenin Ben onun icabına bakarım
english: Why don't you rest in the tent? I'll take care of him.

text: Noyan'ın yerini söyleyene kadar parmaklarını teker teker kıracağım
english: I'm gonna break your fingers one by one until you tell me where Noyan is.

text: Şş şş... Sonra ayağındaki kemikleri kırıp
english: Shh... then break the bones on your feet

text: sen pelte gibi yere yığılana kadar durmayacağım
english: I'm not gonna stop until you drop like a jelly.
Let me know when you're awake.

text: Birkaç güne kadar bir şeyin kalmaz Halime Hatun
english: You'll be fine in a few days, Halima Hatun.
She's passed out, the spawn of a snake.
We've got to get him to talk before he leaves, Dad.
It's in his eyes that he knows something.
Uncle, we have too many martyrs.

text: Noyan keferesini bulup öldürmeden bize rahat yok baba
english: There's no rest for us, Dad, until we find the Noyan shroud and kill it.
We have to make him pay.
The man who attacked you has a shaved head.

text: tepesinde örgülü bir saçı var mıydı?
english: Did he have a braided hair on his head?
Some of the army attacked the caravan.

text: Bir kısmı da Ertuğrul'un peşinden gitmiş
english: Some of them went after Ertuğrul.
So they know who he is.

text: En güvendiği adamını da onun peşinden yollamış
english: He sent his most trusted man after him.
How many times have they been following us?
They want to get to know you better, son.

text: Ona göre tuzak kurup, ona göre saldırırlar
english: He thinks they'll set a trap and attack.

text: Ve kaybedecekleri savaşa da asla girmezler
english: And they will not fight against what they lose.
Try to get information from that Mongol.

text: Kim bilir hangi cehennemin dibindedir Noyan
english: Who knows where the hell Noyan is?
You have to find Ertuğrul first.
If they took Ertuğrul like you said,
Would they let my son live?

text: İki lokma bir şey yiyip hemen geleceğim
english: I'll just have a bite to eat and be right back.

text: Sen şu yanan kızın babası mısın?
english: Are you the father of that burning girl?
What did you want with the women?
We wanted to taste it all.
You're gonna get me in trouble!
Tell me where the moongirl is.

text: Dağılan ahaliyi topladık lakin çok can kaybettik
english: We've gathered the disbanded people, but we've lost a lot of lives.
Wait, you can't, I have privacy.
You'd better not go in anyway.

text: Güzel bir hayat için illaki yeni yurt gerekli midir?
english: Is it necessary for a good life to have a new home?

text: Yeni bir yurt, çok güzel bir hayat olacak hepimiz için
english: A new dorm, a beautiful life for all of us.
What did they do to you?
What did they do to you?
Oh, my God, I'm a victim!

text: Hayvanlar için su bulmaya gittiklerinde onları yalnız koymayacaktık
english: We weren't going to put them alone when they went to find water for the animals.

text: Ertuğrul Bey'im o soysuzlara kolay pabuç bırakmaz
english: Mr. Ertugrul won't let those degenerates off easy.

text: Hayme Ana ile Korkut Bey görüşür
english: Hayme Ana and Kork Bey will see each other.

text: Ben sana o Moğol'un başından ayrılmayacaksın demedim mi?
english: Didn't I tell you not to leave that Mongol?
You did, but he was with Big Head.
He must have made a mistake.

text: Beyim kendini sevenlerin kadrini kıymetini pek bilmez Selcan Hatun
english: My master doesn't appreciate those who love him. Selcan Hatun.
What do you squirm about, Gökçe?
I've lost Ertugrul a thousand times.
He died for me every time.
And I came back from the dead.
Every time I die and come back

text: Hâlâ vazgeçmedin değil mi bu sevdadan Gökçe?
english: You haven't given up yet, have you, Gökçe?

text: Sadece göz boyayıp dilini bağladın, değil mi?
english: You just shined and tied your tongue, didn't you?
It's been a long time since I've swallowed my tongue.

text: Esas sen şimdi ne hal eyleyeceksin?
english: What are you going to do now?
They said you were a tough one.
Don't let the food get in your throat.
How many bites have I eaten like you?
I ate Samarkant when I burned Buhara.
You can't even be a bone.

text: Bir Türk son nefesini vermeden son söz söylenmemiştir
english: No last word has been made before a Turk gives his last breath
Before the angel of death comes and takes my life
The one who wants you to live
There's scalding and bread, my lord.

text: Zahterle kekik de koydun mu içine?
english: Did you put thyme in it with zahter?
I've been wandering the road for years
Our tongue has chosen to eat.

text: Ee beyim, nedir sizi böyle yollara koyan?
english: So, sir, what puts you on the road like this?
The desire to have it, Innkeeper.

text: Harzemşahlar yenilince topraklarımıza Moğol öncü birlikleri girmiş derler
english: When the Harzemşahs were defeated, they say the Mongol advance troops entered our land.

text: Başlarında da Noyan denilen bir cellat varmış
english: They were led by an executioner called Noyan.

text: O soysuz köpekler bunca yıldır er görmediler
english: Those bastards haven't seen a private in years.
They were unjust until they saw it.

text: Sultan Alaeddin onlara cenk etmesini belletecektir evelallah
english: Sultan Alaeddin will teach them to fight.

text: Noyan denilen celladın zalimliği dilden dile dolaşır
english: The cruelness of the Noyan executioner is heard in tongues.

text: Sütü bozuk, Horasan ellerindeki kardeşlerimizi, Semerkant'ımızı
english: The milk is bad, Horasan, our brothers, our Samarkand.

text: Bir gün cenk edip intikamımızı alacağız elbet
english: One day we'll fight and avenge

text: Onu gördüğün vakit ne yapmak istersin?
english: What do you want to do when you see him?

text: Bu elimdeki bıçakla kellesini koparmak isterdim
english: I'd like to cut his head off with this knife in my hand.

text: Bu dediğin mutlaka bir gün olacaktır

english: Do you want it to be on time?

text: En kısa vakitte o soysuzu gebertmek isterim
english: I'd like to kill that bastard as soon as possible.

Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah.

Yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah, yeah.

text: He le le leh... He le le lel leh
english: He le le favor... he le le le lal favor
You got what you wanted, young man.

text: Ama bunun içinde başka bir şey daha var
english: But there's something else in this.

text: Geceleri yalnız uyumayı hiç sevmem hancı
english: I don't like to sleep alone at night, Innkeeper.

text: O zaman hoş bir kadın bulabilirsin ha?
english: Then you can find a nice woman, huh?
Do you have a daughter or something?

text: Birkaç gün beni idare edeceksin Misafir Ertuğrul'u burada bekleyeceğim
english: You'll cover for me for a few days. I'll wait here for guest Ertuğrul.

text: Bu Türkler, dost kim düşman kim bilmiyorlar asker
english: These Turks, they don't know who the enemy is, soldier.

text: Cesetleri avluya çıkartın Kervansarayın kapılarını kapatın
english: Take the bodies out into the courtyard. Close the gates of the caravansaray.

text: Gözünü kırpmadan, Ertuğrul'u bulmak için onca tehlikeye atılacaksın
english: Without blinking, you'll be in so much danger to find Ertugrul.

text: Başı darda olan herkese yardım etmek boynumuzun borcudur
english: It's our duty to help everyone who's in trouble.

text: Öyle. Lakin başı dertte olan Ertuğrul ise
english: It is, but Ertuğrul is in trouble.

text: o vakit yardım severliğin daha da kıymete biner
english: Then your charity will be even more valuable.
Look, Ertuğrul's fame is from Genghishan's palace

text: Sen de en az onun kadar cesur hatta ondan daha zekisin
english: You're just as brave as he is, even smarter than he is.
Why would you say that to me?

text: Çünkü analar, evlatları şan kazanıp bey olsun isterler evlat
english: Because mothers and sons want glory, son.
I'd like to go with you, brother.

text: Sen bacımı yalnız koyma Biz gereğini yaparız kardeşim
english: Don't put my sister alone. We'll take care of her, brother.
Don't come back until you find our master.

text: Ertuğrul'la Halime Sultan'ın saldırıya uğradığı yer burası
english: This is where Ertugrul and Halime Sultan were attacked.
We'll be on our way from three arms.

text: Ortada biz, Gündoğdu'yla. Sağ ve sol kolda da atlı birlikler bizi takip edecek
english: We're in the middle, with Gündüz, and the cavalry will follow us in the right and left arm.

text: Herhangi bir saldırı anında bize destek olup güvenliğimizi alacaklar
english: They'll back us up at any time of attack, and they'll take our safety.
What scouts did you take with you?

text: En iyilerini baba Samsa ve Boğaca
english: The best of them, Father Samsa and Bulls.

text: Ben de en iyi Alplerimi yanıma aldım dayı Merak etmeyesin
english: So I took my best Alps with me, Uncle. Don't worry.
Noyan came from Tebriz with advance troops

text: Amacı bilgi toplayıp, esas saldırı için hazırlık yapmakmış
english: His goal was to gather information and prepare for the main attack.

text: Allah yardımcınız olsun Gazanız mübarek olsun
english: May God be with you. May your wrath be blessed.
The journey is only from Allah.

text: Beyini bulmak için bunca yiğidimi tehlikeye atıyorum
english: I'm risking all my strength to find the brain.

text: Yolda hiçbir hatayı affetmem, ona göre
english: I don't forgive any mistakes on the way, according to him.

text: Bizim ona itimadımız tamdır Sen de güvenebilirsin
english: We have no faith in him, and you can trust him.
I'm so sorry about what happened, Selcan.
I heard you lost all three of your children.

text: Bir kadının huzuru da mutluluğu da
yiğidinin soyuna soy boyuna boy katmasındadır
english: It's about the size of your nephew's lineage.
It grieves me to see you like this

text: Veren de alan da Allah'tır, Aytolun
english: It is God who gives and takes, Aytolun.

text: O vakit başkaları için hiç telaş etmeyesin
english: Then don't worry about anyone else.

text: Hem bak, ben seni pek bir iyi gördüm
english: And look, I think you look pretty good.

text: Gidenin yerine kurulmayı bek iyi becermişsin
english: You've done well to replace the one who's gone.
They said you were an angel.

text: Lakin sende bu dil oldukça, şeytan senin sırtından inmez Selcan
english: But as long as you have this language, the devil will not get off your back, Selcan.

text: Lakin şunu da bilesin, senin şeytanların burada cirit atamaz
english: But just so you know, your demons can't hang around here.

text: Geceyi gün eyleyen, günü gece eyleyen
english: Who maketh the night to pass into the day, and maketh the day to pass into the night,
It is my Lord who has turned away the calamity, and has decreed a term [of time].

text: düştüğüm bu zilletten bir an evvel beni çıkar
english: Get me out of this disgrace as soon as possible.

text: Beni düşmana rüsva eyleyecek çaresizlikte bırakma
english: Don't leave me in despair to disgrace the enemy.
Don't make me bow down to the tyrant
My wife, my mother, my obama waiting for me

text: ve Alplerimi benden dolayı kederlendirme Allah'ım
english: And do not grieve my Alps for me, O Lord.
Though they cut my meat to shreds
Give me strength to endure, Lord

text: Böyle deme Hayme Bu çakalların karşısında dimdik durdunuz
english: Don't say that Hayme You stood tall in front of these jackals

text: Onlar sizden bir can aldıysa siz üç can aldınız
english: If they took one life from you, you took three.

text: Öldürdüklerinin çoğu da kadın ve çocuklarmış
english: Most of the people he killed were women and children.

text: Aslanlar gibi mücadele ettiniz Bunun hesabını er geç verecekler
english: You fought like lions. They'll pay for it sooner or later.
We don't have the goods, we don't have the tents.
As winter came, we were helplessly out in the open.
What am I standing for, Hayme?

text: Burası bir zamanlar senin de obandı
english: This place used to be yours, too.

text: Şimdi doğup büyüdüğün, gelin olduğun obana geri döndün
english: Now you're back to the one you were born and raised, the one you were a bride to.

text: Aytolun, sana ve kızlara çadır hazırlattı
english: Aytolun has made tents for you and the girls.
We'll take care of the wounded and the orphans.
Aytol will take care of this personally.

text: Hayme Ana'yı çadırına götürün Ben de birazdan geleceğim
english: Take Hayme Ana to her tent. I'll be right back.

text: Hayme bacı, inşallah her şey yakında düzelecek
english: Sister Hayme, I hope everything will be all right soon.

text: Ertuğrul'u da sağ salim bulup getirecek Tuğtekin
english: He'll find Ertugrul and bring him back safely.

text: Her şey tez vakitte oldu bitti

english: What do you want to say, Chick?

text: Kurmak istediğin beylik. Kayılarla bir olup kuracağın beylik
english: The company you want to establish, the fiefdom you're going to form with the apricots.
It all came to you at once.

text: Bu acılı günde konuşulacak mesele mi bunlar Aytolun?
english: Is this something to talk about on this painful day, Aytolun?
On the contrary, it's about time, sir.

text: Bu acı günde gereken tedbirler alınmazsa
english: If necessary measures are not taken on this painful day

text: sonumunuz Kayılardan beter olur, bilmez misin?
english: Don't you know you'll end up worse than the apricots?
It's like they gave me the world.

text: Hangi mülk, hangi makam bu kadar güzel olabilirdi?
english: What property, what position could be so beautiful?
She was the same as her mother.
From her beautiful eyes when her mother died

text: tatlı dilinden, yiğit yüreğinden kuvvet almıştı
english: He took strength from his sweet tongue, from his brave heart

text: Hadi be kızım, hadi aç gözlerini
english: Come on, girl, come on, open your eyes.
If he's a martyr, my Aygirl

text: pusatım gök girsin kızıl çıksın ki
english: ♪ My pusat goes through the sky ♪ ♪ Red comes out ♪
I won't put my head on top
Sir, I've used all the medicine we have

text: Lakin yaralıların durumu ciddi Çoğu yarını bile görmez
english: But the injuries are serious. Most of them don't even see tomorrow.

text: Bugün onların başına gelen yarın bizim başımıza da gelecektir
english: What happened to them today will happen to us tomorrow.
I'll send word to Sultan Alaeddin.

text: Celalettin Harzemşah yenildikten sonra Moğolların önünde engel kalmadı
english: After JalaIettin Harzemşah was defeated, there was no obstacle to the Mongols.
We need to get some help from Konya.

text: Yoksa bu eşkıyaların önünde biz set olamayız
english: Otherwise, we can't be a set in front of these thugs.

text: Beyim, Kayılar bir müddet bizimle kalsın
english: Sir, let the apricots stay with us for a while.
With them we strengthen our strength

text: Savaşta dağılan koyun sürüsünü toplayıp daha ucuza satabiliriz
english: We could get a flock of sheep scattered in the war and sell them for less.

text: Bu da erzak almamızı sağlar Önümüz çetin kış
english: That'll get us supplies. It's a tough winter ahead.

text: Hayatta kalan erkekleri de işlerimizi görür
english: A man who survives can do our job.

text: önümüze çıkacak meselelerin altından nasıl kalkacağız onu bilemem
english: I don't know how we're gonna deal with things that are gonna get in our way.

text: İnşallah tüm ahali onlara kucak açacaktır
english: I hope all the people will embrace them.

text: Vakti zamanında Hazreti Peygamberimizin sahabeleri olan
english: Once upon a time, our Prophet's court
Just as the Muhajir and Ensar embraced

text: Onu takip edelim diye iz bırakmış
english: He left a trail so we could follow him.

text: Fazla uzağa gidemezler Onu yürüyerek götürüyorlar. Hadi
english: They can't get far, they're taking him on foot.

text: İyi ki Dündar'la Yiğit'i alp eğitimi almak için uzaklara gönderdik
english: It's a good thing we sent Dündar and Yiğit away to get an alpine education.

text: En azından onlar için tasalanmayız ana
english: At least we won't worry about them, Ma.

text: Sizin gibi gelinlerim olduğu için ne kadar gururluyum bilseniz
english: How proud I am to have brides like you
I hope they find Ertugrul and bring him back.
But we're not gonna fall behind on our jobs.
We won't leave you alone, Mother.

text: Şu toy hele bir toplansın, ondan sonra ne yapacağımıza karar vereceğiz
english: Once this young man gets together, we'll figure out what to do next.
And Oba will recover down in the valley.
We're not going to drown in our pain and leave them headless.
I was going to tell you today.
What were you going to say?
I wanted you to hear from him.
God, we came from you, we'll get back to you.

text: Bize bu kötü günlerde bir can verdin
english: You gave us a life in these bad days.
Don't make that soul an orphan, my God.
They couldn't have gone any further.

text: Gözünüzü dört açın Ertuğrul'u bulmadan obaya dönmek yok
english: Keep your eyes open and don't go back to the Oba until we find Ertugrul.

text: Yolunu kaybedenden alp, haddini bilmeyenden de bir halt olmaz
english: Who loses his way, who doesn't know his way around and who doesn't know his way around?

text: O çizme gibi dilini bileyleyeceğine beyine sahip çıksaydın
english: Instead of sharpening your tongue like that boot, why don't you take care of the brain?

text: Bu tarafta hiç iz yok. Tepenin öbür yamacına bak. Bir işe yararsın belki
english: There's no sign of you on this side, look at the other side of the hill, maybe you'll be useful.

text: Aşağıda nehrin kenarında hiç iz yoktur beyim
english: There are no tracks down by the river, sir.

text: Yarına kalırsak, işimiz daha da zor olacak
english: If it's tomorrow, it'll be even harder.
I'm afraid there's no sign of him.

text: Gece olana kadar aramaya devam edelim

english: Sir, the guest you've been waiting for has arrived.
You're gonna be okay with this for now.

No, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no, no!

text: İyi ki Bamsı, Dündar'la Yiğit'i alplik eğitimi için Toroslar’a götürdü
english: Fortunately, Bamsi took Dündar and Yiğit to Toros for an alpine education.
If only he were here now.
♪ Blood would take the body, brother ♪

text: Şeytan diyor ki Bamsı gibi önünü ardını düşünme
english: The devil says don't think back like Bamsu
Cut off that big head of Bigfoot's.
What the hell if he does?

text: Bilesiniz ki artık Süleyman Şah'ın Kayıları eziktir
english: You should know that Solomon Shah's Apricots are now losers.
It's the docking, it's the sanctuary.

text: Ettiğimiz her lafı ölçüp biçerek edeceğiz gayrı
english: We'll measure and measure every word we say

text: Alplerin çok sabırsız Gündoğdu abi Samanlıkta iğne aradığımızı bilmezler mi?
english: Don't your Alps know we're looking for a needle in a haystack?
And Ertugrül made them his brothers.
He may not be Ertugrul anymore.
None of you have the right to let go.

text: Obanın içine düştüğü bu durumdan kurtulması için
english: To get him out of this situation that he's been through.

text: çıkar yol sağlayacak biri varsa, o da sensin abi
english: If anyone can find a way out, it's you, brother.

text: Bilesin ki babam da ben de sonuna kadar yanındayız
english: I want you to know that my father and I are with you until the end.

text: şimdi bir ve birlik olma zamanıdır
english: Now it's time for one and unity

text: Zaten başımıza ne geldiyse, bugüne kadar bunu beceremediğimiz için geldi
english: Whatever happened to us already happened because we couldn't do it until today.

text: sen daha onu tanımazsın yeğenim O her türlü belanın altından kalkar
english: You don't even know him, nephew. He can handle any kind of trouble.
He'll make the devil wear his shoes upside down.
Let's hope we find him alive.
Let's be in the same land this winter

text: Kenetlenelim. Suyumuz bol Ekmeğimizi de bölüşürüz
english: We'll split the bread with plenty of water.

text: Hem Moğol'a karşı da birlikte oluruz Kış burada sert geçer abi
english: Besides, we'll be together against the Mongols. Winter will be tough here.
When it comes to spring, the war is upon us.

text: Alaeddin'in ordusuyla birlik olup Moğol'u toprağımızdan atarız
english: We will join Alaeddin's army and expel the Mongol from our land.
Move it, move it, move it!

text: Bu çakalı çalıların arasında yakaladım. Bizi dinliyordu herhalde
english: I caught this coyote in the bushes, I think he was listening to us.

text: Söyle bakalım, Noyan'ın iti misin sen?
english: Tell me, are you Noyan's dog?

text: Onun adı Geyikli. Meczup, divane bir gezgindir. Zararı yoktur
english: His name is Deer, he's a metzup, he's a wild traveler, he's harmless.

text: Ama onu bugüne kadar kimsenin yakaladığı vaki değildir
english: But it's not like anyone ever caught him.

text: İz sürmeyi beceremesen de kulakların keskinmiş. Tebrik ederim
english: Your ears are sharp, even though you can't keep track.

text: Lakin bilesin ki geyikten hızlı, tilkiden kurnaz
english: But just so you know, faster than a deer, more cunning than a fox.

text: ayıdan da güçlüdür. Daha fazla bulaşma

english: I've been waiting for you, dear friend.
Yes, I'm the devil of hell.
Sir, there's smoke rising from the caravan.

text: Ben size söylemiştim. Demiştim! Beni dinlemediniz işte!
english: I told you, I told you, you didn't listen to me!

text: Eğer bu Kocabaş uğursuzu yüzünden beyimin başına bir şey gelirse
english: If anything happens to my master because of this Big Bad luck
I'll ask all of you to pay for this.

text: Böyle ileri geri konuşmaya devam edersen doğruca obaya dönersin, bilmiş ol
english: You keep talking back and forth like that, you're going straight back to the Oba, you know that?
Welcome to the world of Mongols

text: Teknik Yapım: Murat Çağlar Özçelik Havva Faydalı
english: Technical Production: Murat Çağlar Özçelik Eve benefitlı
